title: RemoveSubordinate (Method)
text:
METHOD RemoveSubordinate : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Removes a subordinate (given by a BACnet-Object-Reference) and a subordinate anotation at index nIndex from the Subordinate_List-Property and
the Subordinate_Annotations-Property of this BACnet-Object. Both the subordinate and its annotation are removed simulatenously by
this function.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the subordinate to remove.
